SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM NUM, G.SEQ, G.USER_NO, M.EMAIL, M.USER_NAME, G.USER_SEQ, P1.NAME_KR USER_PNAME, P1.FRONT_IMAGE USER_PIMG, G.USER_SCORE, G.COM_SEQ, P2.NAME_KR COM_PNAME, P2.FRONT_IMAGE COM_PIMG, G.COM_SCORE, G.GAME_RESULT, G.REG_DT FROM GAME_LOG G LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON G.USER_NO = M.USER_NO LEFT JOIN POKEMON P1 ON G.USER_SEQ = P1.SEQ LEFT JOIN POKEMON P2 ON G.COM_SEQ = P2.SEQ ORDER BY G.SEQ DESC )
WHERE NUM >= #{offset} AND NUM < #{endRows}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GAME_LOG G LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON G.USER_NO = M.USER_NO LEFT JOIN POKEMON P1 ON G.USER_SEQ = P1.SEQ LEFT JOIN POKEMON P2 ON G.COM_SEQ = P2.SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAME_LOG (SEQ, USER_NO, USER_SEQ, USER_SCORE, COM_SEQ, COM_SCORE, GAME_RESULT) VALUES (SEQ_GAME_LOG.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{userSeq}, #{userScore}, #{comSeq}, #{comScore}, #{gameResult})
